ValidationRule.description: SSP-176 Once Order is Submitted for Approval, it not canot be edited if its not a ZOR type
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
NOT(TEXT(Salesforce_Order_Type__c) = 'ZOR') && ISPICKVAL(Status, 'Submitted/ In Approval') && ( ISCHANGED(AccountId) || ISCHANGED(BillingAddress) || ISCHANGED(OpportunityId ) || ISCHANGED(TotalAmount ) || ISCHANGED(CurrencyIsoCode ) || ISCHANGED(Name ) || ISCHANGED(OrderNumber ) || ISCHANGED(OwnerId ) || ISCHANGED(EffectiveDate ) || ISCHANGED(Plant__c ) || ISCHANGED(S4_Order_Type__c ) || ISCHANGED(Sales_Organisation__c ) || ISCHANGED(Division__c ) || ISCHANGED(Distribution_Channel__c ) || ISCHANGED(Pricebook2Id ) || ISCHANGED(Ship_To_Account__c ) || ISCHANGED(ShipToContactId ) || ISCHANGED(ShippingAddress ) || ISCHANGED(IncoTerms__c ) || ISCHANGED(IncoTerms_Location__c ) || ISCHANGED(SAP_Order_ID__c ) || ISCHANGED(Payment_Terms__c ) || ISCHANGED(Shipping_Condition__c ) || ISCHANGED(Delivery_Block__c ) || ISCHANGED(KSA_Short_Address__c ) || ISCHANGED(Shipping_Carrier__c ) || ISCHANGED(Shipment_Cost__c ) || ISCHANGED(TSCA_Approval_Needed__c ) || ISCHANGED(HQ_Account__c ) || ISCHANGED(RHQ_Account__c ) || ISCHANGED(End_Customer__c) || ISCHANGED(Potential_Volume__c) || ISCHANGED(Application__c)
) && $User.Username <> 'support.gauri@gauri.com.syn'
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Once Sample Order is Submitted for Approval, it not canot be edited
